title: Bring your family home! Res Lease in Austin. 4 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Adorable home in the desirable community of Independence Park!
Home is located RIGHT by the walking trails run right through the neighborhood + sidewalks and green spaces!
Wonderfully functional floor plan offers a spacious Living Room that is open to the HUGE Kitchen.
Gorgeous Kitchen has ample cabinet storage, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a dining area with patio access!
Hardwoods, tile floors throughout the living areas - easy maintenance!
Powder bath and Laundry Room located on the main level for the ultimate convenience.
Primary Bedroom is located on the main level with a private en-suite full bath and great closet space.
Large Flex Space upstairs serves as amazing extra space for an Office/Work out area or Play Room!
Secondary Bedrooms and Full Bath are located upstairs and all have great closet space.
Beautiful Screened back patio has TV hookups and is a great size - perfect for dinners al fresco!
Great back yard is easy to maintain and fully fenced!
Front Yard lawn maintenance is covered by HOA!
*TV in Living Room and TV on back patio convey with the lease!
--to set up a viewing--
